title: Continual Learning for Autonomous Robots: A Prototype-based Approach
abstract: arXiv:2404.00418v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Humans and animals learn throughout their lives from limited amounts of sensed data, both with and without supervision. Autonomous, intelligent robots of the future are often expected to do the same. The existing continual learning (CL) methods are usually not directly applicable to robotic settings: they typically require buffering and a balanced replay of training data. A few-shot online continual learning (FS-OCL) setting has been proposed to address more realistic scenarios where robots must learn from a non-repeated sparse data stream. To enable truly autonomous life-long learning, an additional challenge of detecting novelties and learning new items without supervision needs to be addressed. We address this challenge with our new prototype-based approach called Continually Learning Prototypes (CLP). translated_title: 自主机器人的持续学习：基于原型的方法
translated_abstract: 人类和动物在他们一生中从有限的感知数据中学习，既有监督也有无监督。未来的自主智能机器人通常也被期望能做到同样。现有的持续学习方法通常不直接适用于机器人设置：它们通常需要缓冲和平衡重放训练数据。提出了少样本在线持续学习（FS-OCL）设置，以解决更真实的场景，即机器人必须从不重复的稀疏数据流中学习。为了实现真正的自主终身学习，需要解决一个额外的挑战，即检测新颖性并在无监督的情况下学习新项目。我们用称为持续学习原型（CLP）的新基于原型的方法来解决这一挑战。除了能够进行FS-OCL学习之外，CLP还能检测新颖对象并在无监督的情况下学习它们。
tldr: 提出了基于原型的持续学习方法CLP，能够应用于自主机器人中进行少样本在线持续学习，并能在无监督情况下检测和学习新颖对象。
en_tdlr: Introduced a prototype-based continual learning approach, CLP, which can be applied to autonomous robots for few-shot online continual learning, and is capable of detecting and learning novel objects without supervision.
